S04n472:1: atha khalu bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayate sma-avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
S04n472:3: dvitīyakamapi bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma-avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
S04n472:5: tṛtīyakamapi bhagavāṃstan bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma-avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
S04n472:7: atha khalu sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamagrataḥ sthāpayitvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantametadavocat-bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
S04n472:10: dvitīyakamapi sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat-bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
S04n472:13: tṛtīyakamapi sa sarvāṃvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat-bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
S04n472:16: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yāvattṛtīyakamapyadhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā tān bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma-tena hi kulaputrāḥ śṛṇudhvamidamevaṃrūpaṃ mamādhiṣṭhānabalādhānam,
S04n472:17: yadayaṃ kulaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuro loka evaṃ saṃjānīte-sāṃprataṃ bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatena śākyakulādabhiniṣkramya gayāhvaye mahānagare bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddheti |
S04n472:19: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ bahūni mama kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya |
S04n472:20: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇavaḥ,
S04n472:22: sa ekaṃ paramāṇurajaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi pañcāśallokadhātvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya tadekaṃ paramāṇurajaḥ samupanikṣipet |
S04n472:23: anena paryāyeṇa kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sa puruṣaḥ sarvāṃstāllokadhātūna vyapagatapṛthivīdhātūn kuryāt,
S04n472:24: sarvāṇi ca tāni pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇurajāṃsi anena paryāyeṇa anena ca lakṣanikṣepeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśyupanikṣipet |
S04n472:25: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ te lokadhātavaḥ kenaciccintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā?
S04n472:26: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sa ca sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo bodhisattvarāśirbhagavantametadavocat-asaṃkhyeyāste bhagavallokadhātavaḥ,
S04n472:28: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhairapi bhagavan āryeṇa jñānena na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā |
S04n472:29: asmākamapi tāvad bhagavan avaivartyabhūmisthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasmin sthāne cittagocaro na pravartate |
S04n472:31: evamukte bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānetadavocat-ārocayāmi vaḥ kulaputrāḥ,
S04n472:33: yāvantaḥ kulaputrāste lokadhātavo yeṣu tena puruṣeṇa tāni paramāṇurajāṃsyupanikṣiptāni,
S04n472:35: sarveṣu teṣu kulaputra lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu na tāvanti paramāṇurajāṃsi saṃvidyante,
S04n472:37: yataḥprabhṛtyahaṃ kulaputrā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S04n472:39: ye ca mayā kulaputrā atrāntarā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ parikīrtitā dīpaṃkaratathāgataprabhṛtayaḥ,
S04n472:43: tathāgata āgatāgatānāṃ sattvānāmindriyavīryavaimātratāṃ vyavalokya tasmiṃstasminnātmano nāma vyāharati |
S04n472:45: tathā tathā ca sattvān paritoṣayati nānāvidhairdharmaparyāyaiḥ |
S04n472:46: tatra kulaputrāstathāgato nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāmalpakuśalamūlānāṃ bahūpakleśānāmevaṃ vadati-daharo'hamasmi bhikṣavo jātyābhiniṣkrāntaḥ |
S04n472:52: sarve ca te kulaputrā dharmaparyāyāstathāgatena sattvānāṃ vinayārthāya bhāṣitāḥ |
S04n472:53: yāṃ ca kulaputrāstathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ vinayārthavācaṃ bhāṣate ātmopadarśanena vā paropadarśanena vā,
S04n472:54: ātmārambaṇena vā parārambanena vā yatkiṃcittathāgato vyāharati,
S04n472:59: na jāyate na mriyate na cyavate nopapadyate na saṃsarati na parinirvāti,
S04n472:60: na bhūtaṃ nābhūtaṃ na santaṃ nāsantaṃ na tathā nānyathā na vitathā nāvitathā |
S04n472:61: na tathā traidhātukaṃ tathāgatena dṛṣṭaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjanāḥ paśyanti |
S04n472:65: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ nānācaritānāṃ nānābhiprāyāṇāṃ saṃjñāvikalpacaritānāṃ kuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ vividhān dharmaparyāyān vividhairārambaṇairvyāharati |
S04n472:69: na ca tāvanme kulaputrā adyāpi paurvikī bodhisattvacaryāṃ pariniṣpāditā |
S04n472:71: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrā adyāpi taddviguṇena me kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyanti āyuṣpramāṇasyāparipūrṇatvāt |
S04n472:72: idānīṃ khalu punarahaṃ kulaputrā aparinirvāyamāṇa eva parinirvāṇamārocayāmi |
S04n472:74: sattvānahaṃ kulaputrā anena paryāyeṇa paripācayāmi-mā haiva me'ticiraṃ tiṣṭhato'bhīkṣṇadarśanena akṛtakuśalamūlāḥ sattvāḥ puṇyavirahitā daridrabhūtāḥ kāmalolupā andhā dṛṣṭijālasaṃchannāḥ tiṣṭhati tathāgata iti viditvā kilīkṛtasaṃjñā bhaveyuḥ,
S04n472:75: na ca tathāgate durlabhasaṃjñāmutpādayeyuḥ-āsannā vayaṃ tathāgatasyeti |
S04n472:78: tataḥ kulaputrāḥ tathāgataḥ upāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ durlabhaprādurbhāvo bhikṣavastathāgata iti vācaṃ vyāharati sma |
S04n472:80: tathā hi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bahubhiḥ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapi tathāgatadarśanaṃ bhavati vā na vā |
S04n472:81: tataḥ khalvahaṃ kulaputrāstadārambaṇaṃ kṛtvaivaṃ vadāmi-durlabhaprādurbhāvā hi bhikṣavastathāgatā iti |
S04n472:82: te bhūyasyā mātrayā durlabhaprādurbhāvāṃstathāgatān viditvā āścaryasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti,
S04n472:84: apaśyantaśca tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān tṛṣitā bhaviṣyanti tathāgatadarśanāya |
S04n472:85: teṣāṃ tāni tathāgatārambaṇamanaskārakuśalamūlāni dīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya ca bhaviṣyanti |
S04n472:86: etamarthaṃ viditvā tathāgato'parinirvāyanneva parinirvāṇamārocayati sattvānāṃ vaineyavaśamupādāya |
S04n472:89: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ kaścideva vaidyapuruṣo bhavet paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī sukuśalaḥ sarvavyādhipraśamanāya |
S04n472:90: tasya ca puruṣasya bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyurdaśa vā viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā |
S04n472:92: te cāsya sarve putrā garapīḍā vā viṣapīḍā vā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n472:93: tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirabhitūrṇā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n472:94: te tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā dahyamānāḥ pṛthivyāṃ prapateyuḥ |
S04n472:95: atha sa teṣāṃ vaidyaḥ pitā pravāsādāgacchet |
S04n472:96: te cāsya putrāstena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirārtāḥ |
S04n472:99: sarve ca te tenaiva duḥkhenārtāstaṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvābhinandeyuḥ,
S04n472:103: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrān duḥkhārtān dṛṣṭvā vedanābhibhūtān dahyataḥ pṛthivyāṃ pariveṣṭamānān,
S04n472:104: tato mahābhaiṣajyaṃ samudānayitvā varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannaṃ ca,
S04n472:105: śilāyāṃ piṣṭvā teṣāṃ putrāṇāṃ pānāya dadyāt,
S04n472:106: evaṃ cainān vadet-pibatha putrā idaṃ mahābhaiṣajyaṃ varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam |
S04n472:107: idaṃ yūyaṃ putrā mahābhaiṣajyaṃ pītvā kṣipramevāsmād garādvā viṣādvā parimokṣyadhve,
S04n472:109: tatra ye tasya vaidyasya putrā aviparītasaṃjñinaḥ te bhaiṣajyasya varṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā gandhaṃ cāghrāya rasaṃ cāsvādya kṣipramevābhyavahareyuḥ |
S04n472:110: te cābhyavaharantastasmādābādhāt sarveṇa sarvaṃ vimuktā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n472:111: ye punastasya putrā viparītasaṃjñinaḥ te taṃ pitaramabhinandeyuḥ,
S04n472:112: enaṃ caivaṃ vadeyuḥ-diṣṭayāsi tāta kṣemasvastibhyāmāgato yastvamasmākaṃ cikitsaka iti |
S04n472:116: tathā hi teṣāṃ tayā viparītasaṃjñyā tad bhaiṣajyamupanāmitaṃ varṇenāpi na rocate,
S04n472:118: atha khalu sa vaidyapuruṣa evaṃ cintayet-ime mama putrā anena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā viparītasaṃjñinaḥ |
S04n472:122: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrānupāyakauśalyena tadbhaiṣajyaṃ pāyayitukāma evaṃ vadet-jīrṇo'hamasmi kulaputrāḥ,
S04n472:130: sa evaṃ tān putrānupāyakauśalyena anuśiṣya anyataraṃ janapadapradeśaṃ prakrāntaḥ |
S04n472:131: tatra gatvā kālagatamātmānaṃ yeṣāṃ glānānāṃ putrāṇāmārocayet,
S04n472:133: atīva parideveyuḥ-yo hyasmākaṃ pitā nātho janako'nukampakaḥ so'pi nāmaikaḥ kālagataḥ,
S04n472:135: te khalvanāthabhūtamātmānaṃ samanupaśyanto'śaraṇamātmānaṃ samanupaśyanto'bhīkṣṇaṃ śokārtā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n472:136: teṣāṃ ca tayābhīkṣṇaṃ śokārtatayā sā viparītasaṃjñā aviparītasaṃjñā bhavet |
S04n472:137: yacca tad bhaiṣajyaṃ varṇagandharasopetaṃ tadvarṇagandharasopetameva saṃjānīyuḥ |
S04n472:140: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrānābādhavimuktān viditvā punarevātmānamupadarśayet |
S04n472:141: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrā mā haiva tasya vaidyasya tadupāyakauśalyaṃ kurvataḥ kaścinmṛṣāvādena saṃcodayet?
S04n472:145: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ ahamantarāntaramevaṃrūpāṇyupāyakauśalyāni sattvānāmupadarśayāmi vinayārtham |
S04n472:146: na ca me kaścidatra sthāne mṛṣāvādo bhavati ||
S04n472:147: atha khalu bhagavānimāmeva arthagatiṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n472:172: evaṃ ca haṃ teṣa vadāmi paścāt
S04n472:178: yūyaṃ ca śabdaṃ na śṛṇotha mahyaṃ
S04n472:200: evaṃ ca me kṣetramidaṃ sadā sthitaṃ
S04n472:204: na cāpi me nāma śṛṇonti jātu
S04n472:223: mṛṣā mamā naiva kadāci vāg bhavet ||19 ||
S04n472:227: taṃ vaidyu vijño na mṛṣeṇa codayet ||20 ||
